name: resonant
content:
resonant adjective
(SOUND)
Add to word list
Add to word list
clear and loud, or causing sounds to be clear and loud: a deep, resonant voice a resonant concert hall See also
resound

resonant adjective
(QUALITY)
making you think of a similar experience or memory: We felt privileged to be the first group of Western visitors to enter the historic palace, resonant with past conflicts.
